div.p:
( a) Reconstructed Niño 3.4 SSTs over 1301–2005 based on tree ring records from the tropics and mid-latitude
31 . SST anomalies (SSTAs) are relative to the mean of observed SSTs during 1971–2000. ( b) Continuous wavelet of Niño 3.4 SSTs time series over 1301–2005. This shows significant periodicities at 2–32 years band. ( c) Average variance of tree ring based SST anomalies (gray curve) and SAT of East Antarctica based on ice core records at ENSO band (2–8 years).
